availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Martha Ann Hughbanks Shaver (Bracken County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of James Hughbanks and Juliana Hughbanks. Married to Washington Shaver in Bracken County on December 29, 1843. Mother of Missouri Shaver, Simeon P. Shaver, Samuel P. Shaver, Illinois Shaver, Washington Shaver, William Shaver, Catherine Shaver, James A. Shaver, Lallas Shaver, and Martha Shaver. Resident of Bracken County in 1850. Resident of Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 425B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 243-244.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District No. 3, p. 424A-424B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bracken County Marriages, Film #000344098.
"Martha A. Hughbanks Shaver (1826-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial #20889999, Accessed July 8, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/20889999.
